mapper.sql: a.id as id ,a.danyuan_types as danyuanTypes ,a.fangke_name as fangkeName ,a.fangke_phone as fangkePhone ,a.fangke_id_number as fangkeIdNumber ,a.sex_types as sexTypes ,a.fangke_photo as fangkePhoto ,a.fangke_content as fangkeContent ,a.insert_time as insertTime ,a.create_time as createTime
mapper.select:
SELECT
-- 级联表的字段
FROM fangke a
and a.id in
#{item}
and a.danyuan_types = #{params.danyuanTypes}
and a.fangke_name like CONCAT('%',#{params.fangkeName},'%')
and a.fangke_phone like CONCAT('%',#{params.fangkePhone},'%')
and a.fangke_id_number like CONCAT('%',#{params.fangkeIdNumber},'%')
and a.sex_types = #{params.sexTypes}
and a.fangke_content like CONCAT('%',#{params.fangkeContent},'%')
and UNIX_TIMESTAMP(a.insert_time) >= UNIX_TIMESTAMP(#{params.insertTimeStart})
and UNIX_TIMESTAMP(a.insert_time) <= UNIX_TIMESTAMP(#{params.insertTimeEnd})
order by a.${params.orderBy} desc
